data.description:
Fly with your friends and shoot your enemies!

SOAR allows you to take to the sky, using your body to explore a vast city unlike any seen before on Quest.

**This is our Early Access launch. If you would like help shape the development of SOAR, please feel free to engage with the development team on Discord**

MULTIPLAYER
Create or join servers with up to 6 other enlightened individuals to battle across the city in action packed rounds of combat.

FLY
Experience a locomotion unlike any other in VR with embodied flying, stretch out your arms and soar through the sky!

HAND TRACKING
Become fully immersed with hand tracking allowing you to fly and shoot without controllers.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE
Play with the settings of the game world and create your own unique experiences, invite other players to compete in the ruleset of your server!

UAP DOGFIGHT
Escape from swarms of UFOs in single player. Shooting, dodging and bashing your way through the invading swarm.

FUTURE ROADMAP
In the months following launch, SOAR will be updated with new gameplay modes, new flying types, more avatar customization, discoverable and hidden content and a whole lot more. Stay tuned as we regularly update the game every few weeks.

changelog.change_log:
SOAR VR - Update 5 (Patch 0.14.1)

Enhancements:
New Bird Flying Type - Flap your wings and soar like an Eagle. This new flying type gives you a workout whilst also allowing you to experience the magic of bird flight. This flying type is currently immune from damage and unable to blast other players either, so consider it a good pacifist option during Multiplayer matches.

New FX Features:
Blaster - Fire powerful energy bolts from your aura to blast other players out of the sky!
Shield - Channel the powers of the Aegis to block incoming energy blasts. Press B or X to use.
Ping - Amplify your aura to let other players know where to come and find you…or taunt your enemies. Press in the right stick to trigger.
Trail - Paint your name in the sky with an improved visual on the trail.
Player Field FX - The hit-box of other players now echoes the mysterious energy field surrounding the city…the Aegis.

Improvements:
System and graphical performance enhancements allow the game experience to be smoother than ever before.

Miscellaneous:
Various quality-of-life fixes that, whilst important, are far too boring to write up for Patch Notes.

UPDATE 4 - Build 0.13.5 

We have brought numerous improvements and additions to SOAR including:

Scoreboards 
As we advance towards tracking more and more player stats, we now have large electronic billboards around the city which will showcase player’s scores in FFA deathmatches.

Improved multiplayer Netcode
We have made improvements to the behind the scenes programming to improve multiplayer performance allowing more players to join multiplayer games and enjoy all that SOAR has to offer

Misc
We have implemented numerous small level changes and improvements along with bug fixes and other quality of life improvements. We also managed to blast a few bugs that should see improved general stability.

UPDATE 3 - Build 0.11.5 

We have brought numerous improvements and additions to SOAR including:

New Flight Controls!
Squeeze the grip buttons to power up your flight for a more ergonomic and embodied flying experience. Face your palms upwards to hover in place and take in the world around you. You’ll be able to customize your control scheme at the onboarding area at the starting spawn.

Join your friends!
We’ve implemented room-codes to allow your friends to quickly and easily jump directly into your server by inputting your 4-digit code that is automatically generated when you host a server.

New Time Trials Gamemode!
Show off your skills by taking part in our Time Trials across the map. Set your fastest time flying through all the gates and challenge the world to do it faster.

Aim Guide!
Squeeze and hold the trigger halfway to display your shot direction to better aim your blaster. Trade off quantity for accuracy with this slower method to help you land every shot you take.

Misc
We have implemented numerous small level changes and improvements along with bug fixes and other quality of life improvements. We also managed to blast a few bugs that should see improved general stability.

As the Beatles once said, "I've got to admit it's getting better (better), A little better all the time (it can't get no worse)"

This patch update fixes several crash issues on multiplayer server join/leaving and other misc. stability improvements

Welcome to v 0.10.0 - SOAR's 100th development build!
This milestone build includes our player 'onboarding' - find out controls and change settings as you explore this starting area.
You will also notice new wind lines when flying at speed and an increased angle on snap turning.
General performance improvements and bug fixes are also present.
